# Station Alert - Delta Alert - COCKED PISTOL
[italic]Called by: Anyone with Command-Level Access at a working Communications Console, Malfunctioning AI Units, the Supermatter Delaminating, or a Nuclear Fission Device Activating On-Board.[/italic]
[bold]Conditions:[/bold]
The on-board Nuclear Fission Device has been activated by Nuclear Operative Nuclear Operations.
[bold]OR[/bold]
The supermatter is in the process of delaminating. This is a station-wide threat.
[bold]Security:[/bold]
In the case of a Nuclear Operative activating the Nuclear Assurance Device, all security personel are to prioritize defusal of the NAD. If defusal is not possible, evacuation procedures are to be followed.
[bold]Secure Areas:[/bold]
EVA Storage, Tech Storage, Gravity Generator, Engineering Secure Storage, AI Upload, Vault, Gateway, anywhere else requiring command level access that does not get regularly used.
Procedures are irrelevant.
[bold]General Crew:[/bold]
In the case of Nuclear Operatives that have armed a nuclear device, all personnel are to evacuate off-station immediately if nuclear assurance device in unable to be defused in a timely manner.
